entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23 with temperature rising to minus 17 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then 30 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 23 with temperature rising to minus 17 by morning. Wind chill minus 33 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023
